about_the_game:
The hotel corridors are filled with a mysterious atmosphere. Quarantine has been declared as the intelligence unit reported the presence of a killer in the hotel. Everyone is suspicious, every corridor is filled with danger... Are there killers hiding in the hotel rooms, or just innocent people? This thrilling game presents a tense battle between killers and detectives.

The detectives, working together to find and neutralize the killers, move with determination. Using their special abilities, they strive to protect innocent people and uncover the killers. They must be careful with every step, constantly trying to identify the killer.

Meanwhile, the killers lurk in the dark corners, utilizing their special abilities and evading the detectives to reach their goals. They cast suspicion on everyone and create danger with every move. However, the sharp intellect and strategic thinking of the detectives will not let them escape easily.

Every floor, every corner of the hotel is filled with action. Moving between floors with elevators, searching for clues in mysterious rooms, and dealing with dangers are essential. Who can be trusted, who is suspicious, and the identity of the killers remain uncertain.

This game is not just a game; it's an exciting adventure to enjoy with friends. Each player's choices and tactics can change the course of the game. The intense struggle between innocent people, detectives, and killers provides unforgettable and adrenaline-filled moments. No one knows who the target is; everyone must stay alert. Which side is the good side? Which side is the bad side? The decision is yours.
